text: [Music]
i've been interested in code since i was
nine years old
as i grew up this passion grew into a
profession
at the age of 31 i founded startup with
three friends called cloudendor
six years later amazon web services
acquired us and today we are all part of
aws
[Music]
people often ask me if this was a big
change but really
we're doing almost the same thing as we
did before only
at a much larger scale today i manage
research and development for migration
services inside aws
though aws is for sure a big company
with huge scale
at the same time it's so fast paced and
so closely connected to the customers it
maintains that entrepreneurial spirit
even when cloudera was a young startup
we modeled ourselves
on top of the foundations of aws so the
acquisition
really was a dream come true and it made
me feel again that this is always day
one
